summary: Website for Alexis Granite to collect granite countertop work inquiries, highlighting free estimates and ability to travel anywhere.

existing_features.title: Create a public marketing homepage for a granite work business that prominently communicates (1) "Free Estimates" and (2) "Travel Anywhere" as primary value propositions.
Implement an inquiry/lead capture form that collects granite work inquiries and submits them to the backend for storage.
Add a simple inquiries dashboard page that allows the site owner to view submitted inquiries, protected by Internet Identity authentication.
Define and apply a cohesive visual theme suitable for a granite/stone craftsmanship business (typography, spacing, and a consistent color palette) and use it across all pages and components.
Add generated static images to support the homepage design and render them from the frontend static assets folder.

Update all user-facing branding text to use the company name "Alexis Granite" (instead of "Granite Works" / generic headings) on the public homepage and global layout, while preserving the prominent "Free Estimates" and "Travel Anywhere" messaging.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a lead-capture website for granite work inquiries (contact/inquiry form).
Prominently display messaging that estimates are free.
Prominently display messaging that travel/service area is anywhere.
